channel.title: Duel Anywhere[Question]
channel.description:
How do I make it so that players can challenge eachother to a duel anywhere? I've seen it on many other server's and I'd like to add it myself.
Thanks

item.title: Duel Anywhere[Question]
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:5, topic:479397”][quote author=kidgoku4522 link=topic=597634.msg4207071#msg4207071 date=1359077752]

This is probably the easiest and fastest way. Go into your Client class and find:

And replace it with this:

So, basically if you’re in the duel arena area or not, it will still show the challenge option.
To accept/send the challenge, you’ll have to do the same thing where ever the inDuelArena appears.

now can you help me hmmm
[/quote]
With your height problem? I don’t know how to fix that. I looked through all of the possibilities.[/quote]what’s his problem? if you wanna tell me…
